select t1.*,IFNULL(t3.num,0) applyNum from t_p_s_org t1 LEFT JOIN ( select count(1) num,t2.orgcode from t_b_apply t2 GROUP BY t2.orgcode )as t3 on t3.orgcode = t1.orgcode where t1.removed = '0'
and (t1.province = #{cityId} or t1.city = #{cityId})
and t1.level = #{level}
and t1.orgname like CONCAT('%',#{orgName},'%')
